bug.author: erwanlenagard
bug.description:
I tried to implement the example code introduced in the documentation for beta features : beta_container, beta_columns... However, It returns an error "module 'streamlit' has no attribute 'beta_container'" <denchmark-code>with st.beta_container(): st.write("This is inside the container") # You can call any Streamlit command, including custom components: st.bar_chart(np.random.randn(50, 3)) </denchmark-code>
I tried to upgrade the package without success. How can I resolve this issue ?

comments.comment:
I tried to upgrade the package without success. How can I resolve this issue ?
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/erwanlenagard>@erwanlenagard</denchmark-link> - Can you be more specific? What version of Streamlit are you using, and what error did you get when trying to upgrade to the most current version? Best, Randy
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/randyzwitch>@randyzwitch</denchmark-link> , Thanks for your help. I just restarted my laptop and now everything is working !

I have the same problem. PyCharm doesn't show beta_container or beta_columns as a suggestion for st.beta_, even though beta_color_picker and beta_set_page_config are. dir(st) does not list beta_columns/beta_container nor columns/container Deactivating and reactivating the virtualenv, reinstalling streamlit through pip, and rebooting my computer have had no effect. Technical information: streamlit version: 0.67.1 python version: 3.8 OS: Mac OS X 10.15.6
For anyone who sees this and gets <denchmark-link:https://xkcd.com/979/>DeverCoder</denchmark-link> 'd like I did, this feature is new in Streamlit version 0.69
You need higher version of streamlit try with pip install streamlit==0.69
